channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 19:27 Attack drones, possible reset -district of the old part
item.description: 🟠 19:27 Attack drones, possible reset -district of the old part This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
